020package org.apache.wiki.modules;
021
022/**
023 *  This is a simple interface which is implemented by a number of JSPWiki
024 *  components to signal that they should not be included in things like
025 *  module listings and so on.  Because JSPWiki reuses its internal module
026 *  mechanisms for its own use as well (e.g. RenderingManager uses a PageFilter
027 *  to catch page saves), it's sort of dumb to have these all appear in the
028 *  "installed filters" list.
029 *  <p>
030 *  A plugin developer should never implement this interface.
031 *  
032 *  @since 2.4
033 */
034public interface InternalModule
035{
036}
